overall.description: Compute tensor dot product along specified axes.

axes.description: integer_like If an int N, sum over the last N axes of a and the first N axes of b in order. The sizes of the corresponding axes must match. (2,) array_like Or, a list of axes to be summed over, first sequence applying to a, second to b. Both elements array_like must be of the same length.

output.description: The tensor dot product of the input.
